_comment: Generate this file for your stack. Run an interactive Claude session to create principles tailored to your language/framework. This is a starter template.

principles.name: Don't Repeat Yourself
principles.rule: No code duplication. Extract to shared functions/components.
verification_steps: Search codebase for duplicate logic patterns
Check if similar functions exist in shared utilities

principles.name: Single Responsibility Principle
principles.rule: Each component/function has one reason to change
verification_steps: No mixed UI and business logic

principles.name: Dependency Inversion Principle
principles.rule: Depend on abstractions, not concrete implementations

principles.name: Comprehensive Error Handling
principles.rule: All operations that can fail must have error handling
verification_steps: All API calls wrapped in error handlers

principles.name: Test Coverage
principles.rule: All new code must have tests
